issue.title: [CF 409] Metaicon's center window too large.
issue.body:
Just a minor imperfection. As you can see in this screenshot (http://i.imgur.com/2TB2g.jpg) the main frame of the metaicon editor is so large it begins obscuring other parts of the editor unless you scroll all the way to the bottom.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #409 | Raw

comments.body:
Whoops. I remember I was going to adjust it after I added in the options at the bottom, but I never did. Thanks for reminding me!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
